idea:
Ignitive Digitech Pvt. Ltd. is an acclaimed startup company into Consulting, Products, Technology cum Functional Solutioning and Services. Formed by a team of highly skilled Professionals with over 100+ years of combined experience in IT industry.we are engaged in developing apps, across platforms & various industries broadly categorized as Mobile App Development, Cognitive Solutions (AI, IoT & Blockchain) and Enterprise Solutions.
MOBILITY SERVICES:
Ignitive Digitech Pvt. Ltd. (IDPL) offers complete digital solutions with design and support for mobile, desktop, web and server for clients across following industry verticals- IT, Banking, Insurance, Media, Logistics, Education, Healthcare, Games and more. Our core mobile platforms include iPhone, Android and Windows Mobile.
We provide the entire spectrum of services for building mobile apps - be it App Strategy, Design and Engineering. We build products that encompass mobile, social, cloud and analytics.
We aim to deliver world class mobility solutions that help engage our clients and their users through amazing UI and UX. The importance of UI/UX when it comes on to the digital / mobile space especially in today’s era is extremely critical.
These are at the core of what we do.
IoT Offerings:
Also through our IoT offerings we help our Clients “Transform from being Reactive to Predictive”
At IDPL, IoT is a network of Interconnected things/Devices which are embedded with sensors, Softwares, network connectivity and necessary electronics that enables them to collect and exchange data making them responsive.
-We create innovative products and solutions powered by IoT
-Short iterative product cycles with rapid prototyping methods
-Design and develop prototype hardware and firmware
-Retro fix existing systems, machines with sensors and infrastructure to the cloud for analytics & design.
In addition to the use cases highlighted in the competency deck we also have a ready solution for
- Vehicle tracking (A brilliant use case for Banking, Insurance & Supply Chain industry )
- Reefer monitoring ( Especially for Cold fleets )
- Energy meter monitoring
- Parking System
- Warehousing Solutions
- Agriculture Lending /Collections Systems
While we are also in a position to recommend multiple valuable B2C, B2B and B2E use cases as food for thought and implementation at our client end.
Each of these services are a strong value add to offerings from Banks , Insurance and SCM industry .
Enterprise Solutions ( Available on Capex / Opex )
- LMS ( Lead Management Solution )
- FMS ( Asset tracking Solution )
- Travel Tracker
- Mobile Banking
- CEM / QMS ( * Customer Experience Management/Queue Management System )
        To facilitate *Online Cash deposits/* real time branch audits /eliminate long queue’s & customer wait time / improve employee efficiency at the counter /check for token on the fly/pre pone & post pone requests – all at the customer finger tips on mobile. And many more features…
We request you to visit our website www.ignitivedigitech.com for better understanding our PoS “Pillars of Strength”.
